titles.title: SF676 Christ, from whom all blessings flow

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Christ, from whom all blessings flow,
Perfecting the saints below,
Hear us, who thy nature share,
Who thy mystic body are.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Join us, in one spirit join,
Let us still receive of thine;
Still for more on thee we call,
Thou who fillest all in all.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Closer knit to thee, our Head,
Nourished, Lord, by thee, and fed,
Let us daily growth receive,
More in Jesus Christ believe,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Never from thy service move,
Needful to each other prove,
Use the grace on each bestowed,
Tempered by the art of God.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Love, like death, has all destroyed,
Rendered all distinctions void;
Names, and sects, and parties fall:
Thou, O Christ, art all in all.
